Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class IslandGroup

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.modelObservables.MotherNatureMovementObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Island
it.polimi.ingsw.model.IslandGroup
public class IslandGroup extends Island
IslandGroup is an Island implementation for islands that are unified. The IslandGroup is implemented with the composite pattern.
See Also:

      public IslandGroup(boolean motherNaturePresent, Island... islands)
      Constructs an IslandGroup that is built over the specified islands and have the specified value for the mother presence.
      Parameters:
      motherNaturePresent - true if mother nature is present on the island group, otherwise false
      islands - the unified islands
